name: Magician Generator
explanation: Subtables have been sorted from common to rare. Author: Esko Vesala. Sources: Wikipedia.

tables.name: magician
tables.explanation: Subtables present entries known in different types of genres and worlds. The first subtables are compatible with the largest number of  worlds, and  get more specialized towards the end. Modern and scifi subtables are not called by default to retain compatibility with the default fantasy setting. Some subtables intentionally overlap.

tables.name: mythic
tables.explanation: Imaginary magicians once rumoured to have existed.

tables.name: rare mythic
tables.explanation: Rare imaginary magicians once rumoured to have existed.

tables.name: rare fantasy
tables.explanation: Rare imaginary magicians for fantasy worlds.

tables.name: scifi
tables.explanation: Imaginary magicians for science fiction worlds.

tables.name: rare scifi
tables.explanation: Rare imaginary magicians for science fiction worlds.
